scripts.build: nr build:grammar && nr fix:generated && nr fix:imports && nr build:ts
scripts.build:grammar: antlr-ng -D language=TypeScript -o src/generated src/RclLexer.g4 && cp src/generated/RclLexer.tokens src/ && antlr-ng -D language=TypeScript -visitor -o src/generated src/RclParser.g4 && rm src/RclLexer.tokens
scripts.fix:generated: echo 'Generated files are already in correct location'
scripts.fix:imports: echo 'import { RclLexerBase } from "../RclLexerBase";' | cat - src/generated/RclLexer.ts > temp && mv temp src/generated/RclLexer.ts
